content:
TORONTO - 
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy says students should pressure their political representatives to provide more support to his country to help fight the ongoing Russian invasion.

author: CBC News
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy will speak with university students across Canada on Wednesday via video link.
title: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy to address Canadian university students
content:
Volodymyr Zelenskyy, president of Ukraine, is scheduled to speak with Canadian university students at 10 a.m. EST on Wednesday. CBC News will carry it live.

author: CBC News
description: In this week's issue of our environment newsletter, we look at what effect the new Canadian plastics ban will have on Canadian industry, and how nickel mining could become greener.
title: Plastics ban could spur Canadian companies to tackle harder-to-replace packaging, say industry watchers
